name: Deseret
startIntroPart1: Wars and rumors of wars, plagues and signs in the heavens...
startIntroPart2: The 7th seal will soon be opened, the Lord will soon return, will you worthily prepare the kingdom for His return?
declaringWar: Your continuing harrassment of the saints will no longer be tolerated.
attacked: You will regret attempting to infringe upon our homes, our families, and our rights of worship.
defeated: The Lord's church may stop its official existance, but you will never stamp us out completely before the Lord's return.
introduction: It's good to meet you! May we become friends and mutually benefit and support each others freedom.
neutralLetsHearIt: What do you have to say?
neutralYes: This will be to our mutual benefit.
hateLetsHearIt: I may not trust you, but I will hear you.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
hateYes: This is difficult, but I must agree.
It will benefit the saints, so I must say yes.
afterPeace: It is good to return to peace.
tradeRequest: We believe this may be of mutual benefit to our peoples.
uniqueText: The organization of the restored church allows for local adaptation, and grandscale cooperation. This leads to +20% production, -20% unhappiness from population, and an increase of faith.
uniques: [+20]% Production towards any buildings that already exist in the Capital

name: Constitutional America
startIntroPart1: America has had the opportunity to abide by its founding principles, or to stray to tyranny.
startIntroPart2: Many doubt that America would have been able to succeed as it has without compromising what it stands for at times. Will you have the courage to lead by truth, justice, and liberty for all?
declaringWar: You have become a threat to the free world.
attacked: You will now feel the wrath of patriots fighting and dying to protect their freedoms, their country, and their family.
defeated: You may have defeated America, but the flame of liberty will never be completely extinguished.
introduction: May our citizens freely trade with one another to the benefit of all.
neutralLetsHearIt: What is your interest in our country?
Do you have something to propose?
neutralNo: This will not be to our mutual benefit.
neutralYes: This will be to our mutual benefit.
hateYes: Though we've had our disagreements, this will be good for our people.
afterPeace: May we now return to focusing on the good of our own peoples instead of conquest.
tradeRequest: We believe this may be of mutual benefit to our peoples.
uniqueText: Human freedom allows individuals to pursue their dreams. As they compete they create a better world for all of us. This leads to trade routes also improving production and science.
uniques: [+1 Production, +1 Science] [in all cities] from each Trade Route
